feed.title: Wapy.dev Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Wapy.dev: v1.2.2
entry.content:
Enhancements: - JSON LD schema is added.

Fixes: - Unnecessary leaked user information and ID's are removed from actions and queries. - Minor UI and code updates.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/meceware/wapy.dev/compare/v1.2.1...v1.2.2

entry.title: New release for Wapy.dev: v1.2.3
entry.content:
Fixes: - User information and email leak is fixed. - Reverting github actions network host changes. - Minor ESLint fix.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/meceware/wapy.dev/compare/v1.2.2...v1.2.3

entry.title: New release for Wapy.dev: v1.3.0
entry.content:
Enhancements: - Single entry view is added. Single entry view give more subscription specific information and reports. (#3) - Subscription per category is added on modal in reports page. (#57) - Various UI enhancements - Package updates.

Fixes: - Auth domains are fixed to support http and IP addresses. (#56) - Various bug fixes

Full Changelog: https://github.com/meceware/wapy.dev/compare/v1.2.3...v1.3.0

entry.title: New release for Wapy.dev: v1.3.1
entry.content:
Fixes: - View page bug is fixed for disabled subscriptions. (#3) - Router refresh is fixed when OTP login is used. - Package updates.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/meceware/wapy.dev/compare/v1.3.0...v1.3.1

entry.title: New release for Wapy.dev: v1.4.0
entry.content:
Enhancements

  • Resend functionality is replaced with Generic SMTP. (#61)

For current Resend users, it's still supported as is, but will be deprecated. In .env, replace

RESEND_API_KEY= RESEND_FROM= RESEND_CONTACT_EMAIL=

with

``` EMAIL_SERVER_USER=resend

The value of RESEND_API_KEY

EMAIL_SERVER_PASSWORD=${RESEND_API_KEY} EMAIL_SERVER_HOST=smtp.resend.com EMAIL_SERVER_PORT=587

The value of RESEND_FROM

EMAIL_FROM=${RESEND_FROM}

The value of RESEND_CONTACT_EMAIL

EMAIL_CONTACT_EMAIL=${RESEND_CONTACT_EMAIL} ```

.env.example file is updated accordingly.

  • Wiki pages are created for better readability.

  • Readme is updated to use the new Wiki pages. Screenshots are updated. (d8f04830bbdc210c8ddfb7bb5009a3b0e37e238b)

Fixes

  • Reports page link bug is fixed. (c578ea5295b76c00bfeccc2edb35550271b21ebd)

  • Search text check bug is fixed. (139368af9d9a51c7f605481e9c76eb84edbea553)

  • Missing timezone support in until date is fixed. (7ed5e61c3b307e0e499f939b9a3d1de3afd49e6d)

  • Next notification date error with completed subscription bug is fixed. (70b4d1a43923a45954113434f55c2e6e8ec2aef5)

  • Wrong variable creating with setup script is fixed. (30575ad28581ac58fcb7f726bc842d6c13073535)

  • Package updates. (#62)

  • Node version incremented with Docker. (0e6e921080331650fa9087385aa5121a948d6566)

  • Other UI fixes. (8bb72982b23d5f00b51aafbdf2b9c2084b99bd11, 4abf0309390cb659a14c458827b35cdd1978213e)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/meceware/wapy.dev/compare/v1.3.1...v1.4.0
